channel.title: Personals on Jeff's Resume
channel.description: Recent content in Personals on Jeff's Resume

item.title: Education
item.description: Ph.D. Physics, University of California, San Diego Electron Transfer in Proteins: The Electron Tunneling Matrix. TA for Sally Ride. M.S. Elect. Engineering, University of Iowa, Iowa City Optical Switching at a Nonlinear Dielectric Interface. TA signal processing and control theory. Eta-Kappa-Nu EE Honor Society. B.S. Computer Science University of Iowa, Iowa City

item.title: Skills
item.description: Proficient: Go, kubernetes (contributor), GKE, GRPC, C++ (circa 2011), java (circa 2015), javascript, bazel, linux, shell, git Learning: flutter, constraint problems

item.title: Projects
item.description: mdrip extracts and runs fenced code blocks from markdown, collecting output and reporting errors. This literate programming approach allows tutorials to be tested as part of CI/CD, or conversely, allows e2e tests to be framed as tutorials. gorepomod helps one deploy multiple Go modules from one repository when the modules are interdependent. gol_grid is my implementation of Conway’s game of life using flutter. Used to learn flutter’s BLoc pattern, and test mobile vs web performance of same code.

item.title: Awards
item.description: Spot Bonus Helpouts launch G+ games launch Conops Engineer Appreciation: iGoogle Executive Mgmt Group Impact Award: iGoogle
